name: myanimelist-redesign
description: A redesigned user interface for Myanimelist with multiple themes and layout improvements

scripts.minify-files: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-editor-js
scripts.copy-root-files: cp -r menu javascript images background.js manifest.json build/
scripts.copy-files: npm run copy-root-files && npm run copy-editor-files
scripts.make-build: mkdirp build/css/minified build/javascript build/bbeditor build/images build/menu
scripts.build: npm run make-build && npm run minify-files && npm run copy-files

author: Hritik Vaishnav
